result.title: How do i stop myself from cheating on Codeforces rounds?
result.content:
Please help.
I want to stop myself from doing that, I feel like i am destroying myself by copying others code.
I really want to be a good programmer and aiming of ICPC, FB Hackers cup and GCJ.
I want to improve myself.
I really need your help.
Remember , your comment may help others too.
